name: dotfiles
description: These scripts are configuration files under my home directory.

name: vim-fake
description: Vim plugin to provide a generator of random dummy/filler text.

name: vim-substy
description: Vim plugin to provide mapping functions to quickly input substitution command.

name: vim-textobj-numeral
description: Vim plugin to provide text objects for numbers

name: vim-textobj-samechars
description: Vim plugin to provide text objects for continuous characters
